text: Hu Yamei (; 27 April 1923 â€“ 3 October 2019) was a Chinese physician and medical researcher. She was President of Beijing Children's Hospital, and co- founded Beijing Hu Yamei Children's Medical Research Institute (BHI). She was an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering from 1994 through 2019. She researched leukemia and she cured more than 700 children. Hu died of illness in Beijing on 3 October 2019, aged 96. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography of Hu Yamei on Wiley Online Library Category:1923 births Category:Scientists from Beijing Category:2019 deaths Category:Medical researchers Category:Chinese physicians
title: Hu Yamei
